content.description: This is an easy route for beginning followers.  Just climb the path of least resistance.  If TRed be sure to have long slings.  The top is quite rough.
content.protection: 6 bolts to a chain and bolt anchor.  Rap the route.
content.location: The route starts near a tree on the left side of the rock.

content.description: There are several bolts on the face but the climb appears to be a project given the lack of cleaning.  The crux is face climbing above the small pedestal.
content.protection: Two bolts on top without chains.  Bring long slings for the TR.  Rope length should be about 45 meters.
content.location: Start in the middle of the face and follow the weakness to the big ledge below the top.

content.description: This is a sixty foot rock which faces generally west. WARNING:  The large crystal granite is crumbly, is of lesser quality, and needs cleaning.
